import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import CardStats from "components/Cards/CardStats"; export default function HeaderStats() { const [stats, setStats] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { // appelle ton backend ici fetch("/api/stats") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setStats(data)) .catch((err) => console.error("Erreur:", err)); }, []); if (!stats) return

); }
